report.title: Return a count of items from the occdelta table. Report can be supplied a filter from the filters table
report.description: Return count of records in the occdata database table. Report also supports filters. Occdelta holds a list of recently changed occurrence records.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM occdelta o #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE 1=1 AND #sharing_filter# #idlist#
